content: gauge 10x10 cm = 20 stitches x 24 row the sample is knitted in double moss stitch as shown in the chart on the page 3 use size 4 needles i recommend circular needles with an 80 cm cord but double-pointed needles can also be used size one size / length 140 cm before washing 112 cm using drops air yarn / width 12 cm p s the length after washing may vary when using different yarn yarn drops air 65% alpaca 28% polyamide 7% wool 50 g/150 m you will need 50 g for this project p s if you plan to use a different yarn you may need slightly more drops air is very light and airy which is why the required amount is so small additional materials needed circular needles size 4 i recommend a 60/80 cm cord scissors measuring tape row counter tapestry needle with a rounded tip two markers
